events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived and the tracking info hasn't updated for days.
The customer's message indicates a shipment delay as the package hasn't arrived and tracking is stagnant.
Support agent Laura has been assigned to handle the delivery delay case for this customer.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. I'll be happy to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking ID so I can check the latest updates on the shipment?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is ZX987654321. I hope you can find out what's causing the delay.
Thanks for the details. I've contacted the courier service and they report an unexpected delay due to weather issues. Your package should arrive in 2-3 days.
I appreciate the update. Hopefully, it really arrives soon because I need the item urgently.
We've set a priority on your delivery to speed up the process. You will receive a notification once your package is out for delivery.
Just following up to confirm if your package has arrived and everything is satisfactory with your order.
Yes, I received the package yesterday. Thanks for your help in resolving the delay and keeping me informed.
The support case related to the delivery delay has been closed after successful delivery confirmation from the customer.
